channel.title: Article - E/E (James Lucien) [Future Bass, Ambient]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/eslashe/article
This might as well be the way I announce that I'm going under a [new alias on Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/eslashe) since I've ran out of Soundcloud minutes since around the middle of December. I'm going to be focusing myself on music from now on, and keeping my head out of any trouble. Hope everyone is having a fantastic New Year and I will work on continuing to improve my music.
Enjoy, everyone.
![article|500x500](upload://l3jQk7tnzGRm2ZfkyCwa0b9vcQq.jpg)
